name: Animals Dot to Dot Free to Play. Connect dots
name_original: Animals Dot to Dot Free to Play. Connect dots
description:
After their success with Blini Kids: Animals, LLC Blini Games, the Russian independent developer, releases their second game for Android, Animals: Dot to Dot. This time is a Free to Play game base don the classic game of connecting the dots.
Game features:

• Handmade drawings: Every animal has been created by an experienced artista.
• 36 Different animals
• Languages available: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Russian & Portuguese.
• Amazing original soundtrack created for this game.
• Totally FREE TO PLAY!!!
